name: t1hmph
body: |- wi(wbr(c0, chmph, c1), wi(wcel(c0, ct1), wcel(c1, ct1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, chmph, c1), wi(wcel(c0, ct1), wcel(c1, ct1)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ct1), wcel(c0, ctop))
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ct1), wf1(cv(hs0), cuni(c1), cuni(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, ccn, c0))), wcel(c1, ct1))
-| diffsc(hs0, c0)
-| diffsc(hs0, c1)
-| diffsc(hs0, ct1)
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0[~ =]c1 →(c0 ∈ Fre → c1 ∈ Fre))
⊣ (c0 ∈ Fre → c0 ∈ Top)
⊣ ((c0 ∈ Fre ∧(hs0 : ⋃ c1 ↣ ⋃ c0)∧ hs0 ∈(c1[Cn]c0))→ c1 ∈ Fre)
⊣ d(hs0, c0)
⊣ d(hs0, c1)
⊣ d(hs0, Fre)
